patthana21.28:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ naparittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.28:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ namahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.28:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ naappamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
